title: Pretzels with corned beef hash and poached eggs
description: Homemade pretzels taste wonderful. Top with corned beef hash and poached eggs for a truly original breakfast.
ingredients: 1kg/2lb 3oz strong white bread flour, plus extra for dusting
700g/1lb 9oz floury potatoes, such as King Edward or Maris Piper, cooked and chopped into cubes
1 x 340g/12oz tin corned beef, chopped into cubes
sea salt flakes and freshly ground black pepper, to taste
